summary: The Advancing Toward Impact Aid Full Funding Act (H.R. 5195) seeks to amend section 7014 of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to increase federal funding for impact aid. The bill outlines specific appropriation amounts for fiscal years 2026 through 2031, covering payments related to federal acquisition of real property, basic payments to local educational agencies, payments for children with disabilities, and construction projects.
